mapper.sql: id, username, `password`, real_name, nick_name, sex, telephone, email, birthday, create_user_id, create_time, modify_user_id, modify_time, `status`, 'businessIntroduction','startTime','endTime','starsNum'
mapper.select: select u.username username, u.birthday birthday, u.email email, u.nick_name nick_name, u.real_name real_name, u.sex sex, u.telephone telephone, R.code code, R.name name, F.file_name file_name, F.file_path file_path, F.file_type file_type, F.file_remark file_remark from sys_user u left join map_user_role MR on MR.user_id = u.id left join sys_role R on R.id = MR.role_id left join map_file MF on MF.object_type = '用户' and MF.object_id=u.id left join file F on F.id = MF.file_id where u.id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_user (id, username, `password`, real_name, nick_name, sex, telephone, email, birthday, create_user_id, create_time, modify_user_id, modify_time, `status`,'businessIntroduction', 'startTime','endTime','starsNum') values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update sys_user
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`password` = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
real_name = #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nick_name = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modify_user_id = #{modifyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
`status` = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update sys_user set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `password` = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, real_name = #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nick_name = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_user_id = #{modifyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
